articles.title: Delay in measles vaccinations risk African outbreak: UN - Anadolu Agency
articles.description: UN health agency urges African nations to double down on vaccination campaigns - Anadolu Agency
articles.content:
YAOUNDE, Cameroon
There is a risk of major measles outbreaks as several African nations have delayed vaccination drives, the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Thursday.
